venue.address_2: .5 miles east of Dry River Campground 14.5 Miles east of Route 3
venue.name: Arethusa Falls Parking Lot

item.description: Trailhead:Arethusa Falls Trailhead is located on a spur road off the west side of Route 302, 3.4 miles south of the Willey House Site in Crawford Notch State Park.Dropping more than 200 feet,Arethusa is New Hampshire's highest waterfall.Melting snow will make the falls quite spectacular.We can lunch on Frankenstein Cliffs.Bring snowshoes,ski poles and traction devices.This is a moderate hike.4.7 miles round trip,elevation gain 1400 feet,5 hours estimated time. Steve
item.how_to_find_us: Black Colorado pick up truck NH2431202
item.name: ARETHUSA FALLS & FRANKENSTEIN CLIFFS
